column3: I can confidently say all the food is excellent
column4: and the service good even when gay people haven't just been given the right to marry in NY.  The big square pancakes are almost as ridiculously good as the biscuits
column5: to the point that I make a pig of myself every time I go.  We need this place in Astoria.  Of course
column6: we'll never have anything of the sort
column8: the prices will involve an extra digit.
